name: icarus-mobile
description: Icarus Mobile - Capacitor, React Native, and Expo replacement.

scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build && cd ios/IcarusMobileApp && xcodebuild -workspace IcarusMobileApp.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace -scheme IcarusMobileApp -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build && cd android/app && ./gradlew assembleDebug
